data.title: Drillbit Taylor Defends Blu
data.meta_description: On July 1, 2008, Paramount Home Entertainment will release Drillbit Taylor on rated and unrated DVD and Blu-ray. The film revolves around a hired protector who has been signed to keep bullies off of a few school kids. It will contain bonus materials and extra features, and the DVD will be available for the MSRP (Manufacturer's Suggested Retail Price) of $34.98, while the Blu-ray will run for the MSRP of $39.99.
data.text:
On July 1, 2008, Paramount Home Entertainment will release Drillbit Taylor on rated and unrated DVD and Blu-ray. The film revolves around a hired protector who has been signed to keep bullies off of a few school kids. It will contain bonus materials and extra features, and the DVD will be available for the MSRP (Manufacturer's Suggested Retail Price) of $34.98, while the Blu-ray will run for the MSRP of $39.99.

The Drillbit Taylor unrated releases will feature the following bonus materials:

Commentary by Steven Brill, Kristofor Brown, Troy Gentile, Nate Hartley, David Dorfman

The Writers Get a Chance to Talk: Kristofor Brown and Seth Rogen

Line-O-Rama

Panhandle featurette

Gag reel

Kids on the Loose featurette

Directing Kids featurette

Super Billy featurette

Bully featurette

Bodyguard featurette

Trading Punches featurette

Rap Off featurette

Sprinkler Day featurette

Filkins Fight featurette

The Life of Don featurette

The Real Don: Danny McBride featurette

Trailers

Additional Scenes

Check out the artwork for the Drillbit Taylor releases below:

Stay tuned to IGN DVD for more information about this and other upcoming releases!
